channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nordstrom tops Wall Streetâ€™s earnings expectations, as shoppers buy more clothes and shoes
item.description: The retailer's sales growth is notable at a time when discretionary merchandise and the luxury sector have been under pressure.

item.title: Metal Prices Rise But Remain Subdued by Strong Dollar, Weak Demand
item.description: Base metals rose but the metals complex was mostly down on-month, dragged by a stronger dollar and still-weak demand in China, BMI said.

item.title: Crude Oil Futures Move Higher With Eyes on OPEC
item.description: Oil futures were higher in early trade but lower on the week as some risk premium was taken out of the market with the ceasefire between Israel and He...

item.title: Dell shares fall on light forecast despite growing AI sales
item.description: Dell is a top vendor for computers required to develop and deploy artificial intelligence, especially computers based around Nvidia chips.

item.title: Prolonged Dollar Weakness Is Unlikely in 2025, Federated Hermes Says
item.description: The dollar was slightly down against a basket of currencies and is unlikely to weaken in a sustained manner in 2025, Federated Hermes said, adding onl...

item.title: Workday stock slips on light quarterly forecast
item.description: Workday called for a 25% adjusted operating margin in the current quarter, below Wall Street's estimate of 25.5%.

item.title: U.S. Natural-Gas Futures Gain in Early Trade
item.description: U.S. natural-gas futures were higher and on track for weekly and monthly gains, supported by cold weather and the start of the winter inventory withdr...

item.title: Dow Heads for Best Month of the Year
item.description: U.S. stocks were on track to end November with their biggest monthly gains this year, with chip stocks rallying Friday.

item.title: EasyJet rakes in record $4.5 billion from fare add-ons as CEO slams 'unfair' penalty over practice
item.description: "It's a highly unfair idea that you should not be able to offer products and services targeted for those people who want to use that," Johan Lundgren ...

item.title: CrowdStrike's post-earnings stock drop is a buy. Here's why sellers have it all wrong
item.description: The stock drop plays right into our hands.
